oai:www.clarin.si:11356/1114;2017-07-01T10:47:43Z;hdl_11356_1023;hdl_11356_1024;Slovenian-German Dictionary of Maks Pleteršnik (1894-1895);Pleteršnik, Maks;Furlan, Metka;Dobrovoljc, Helena;Jazbec, Helena;dictionary;lexicography;historical language;The Slovenian-German Dictionary of Maks Pleteršnik was first published in 1894-1895. It contains 103,185 dictionary entries. Beside standard and dialect lexis of the 19th century Slovenian language it includes also an important part of lexis from 16th onwards. The dictionary is based on lexical material collected by Oroslav Caf, Fran Miklošič, Fran Levstik, Fran Erjavec etc., and is enriched with the lexis of literature, newspapers, specialized literature and dictionaries. The dictionary was re-published by ZRC SAZU in 2006 and this publication is the source of the XML encoded version of this repository entry.

This dictionary was published as a printed book:
• Original edition: Pleteršnik, Maks. Slovensko-nemški slovar. V Ljubljani : Knezoškofijstvo, 1894.
• Re-published edition: Pleteršnik, Maks. Slovensko-nemški slovar. Transliterirana izd. Ljubljana : Založba ZRC, ZRC SAZU, 2006. notes:
The Slovenian-German Dictionary of Maks Pleteršnik was first published in 1894-1895. It contains 103,185 dictionary entries. Beside standard and dialect lexis of the 19th century Slovenian language it includes also an important part of lexis from 16th onwards. The dictionary is based on lexical material collected by Oroslav Caf, Fran Miklošič, Fran Levstik, Fran Erjavec etc., and is enriched with the lexis of literature, newspapers, specialized literature and dictionaries. The dictionary was re-published by ZRC SAZU in 2006 and this publication is the source of the XML encoded version of this repository entry.

This dictionary was published as a printed book:
• Original edition: Pleteršnik, Maks. Slovensko-nemški slovar. V Ljubljani : Knezoškofijstvo, 1894.
• Re-published edition: Pleteršnik, Maks. Slovensko-nemški slovar. Transliterirana izd. Ljubljana : Založba ZRC, ZRC SAZU, 2006. ISBN 961-6568-31-0.
title: Slovenian-German Dictionary of Maks Pleteršnik (1894-1895)
